721643f-a.title: Manhattan: Mercer Street - Spring Street
721643f-a.folder: Mercer Street & Spring Street, Manhattan, NY

723366f-b.title: Manhattan: Spring Street - Mercer Street
723366f-b.text:
1)
107 Spring Street - 101 Mercer Street, a frame house at the N.W.
corner, faced with brick on the Spring Street side.
1932.
J. Clarence Davies Collection, Mueeum of the City of New York.
Negative No. 552.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, a slightly later view.
April 29, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
